content: soften up your space with this interesting crochet blanket showcasing the hazy dye effect of caron colorama haze textural puff stitches work up into a striped masterpiece to create this wonderful layer of warmth on this simple pattern you ll work flat and practice single_crochet double_crochet puff stitches and tassels an easy-to-memorize 2-row repeat makes this a perfect project for meditative stitching materials caron® colorama haze™ 8 oz/227 g 649 yds/593 m daydream 92001 4 balls or 2532 yds/2315 m measurements approx 48 x 56 122 x 142 cm excluding tassels
